attributes.title: How I feel about this app
attributes.review: President Trump is a very unprofessional man and doesn’t deserve his own app  to spread his campaign let alone be president. He wasn’t qualified to be president and still isn’t so everyone reading give this app a bad review so the App Store takes it off for good.

attributes.title: Ewww

attributes.title: Your playing with fire
attributes.review: So this app is super slow and buggy and needs to be taken off the App Store it almost took a week to download tomorrow something very important is being taken away and it’s your fault so play with fire get your way. And see what happens and a hint tiktok

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This app is complete garbage. No point in this application. Waste of time and money.

attributes.title: Worst app do not download
attributes.review: This app was filled with lies and included extremely destructive content. This app brings no positivity to the world and honestly made me sad when I downloaded it. This kind of content should not be supported and it needs to be taken down IMMEDIATELY, do not download and those who do beware.

attributes.title: Liberals are crazy...
attributes.review: If you’d like proof read the reviews😂 there are countless lies, the app is great! I just downloaded it.

attributes.title: Zero Stars
attributes.review:
Some of this is sarcasm!

I would give this zero stars but that just isn’t possible. This app took so long to download then told me it was running maintenance. When I finally got in I had to resend the text message like ten times! Then it wanted my location no you can’t track me! Then I got a voicemail saying it was the president. He has such a disgusting voice! 🤮🤢 Then nothing on the app would load how annoying. So sad I can’t use such a trash app. You just lost a loyal trump supporter.

attributes.title: Battery issues 🤢
attributes.review:
Drains your battery worse than playing an online game with your brightness all the way up and graphics turned to the max! 
Not worth it. Send your time on something better.😒
